articles.author: USA TODAY, Julia Thompson, USA TODAY
articles.title: As Canada border-crossing restrictions ease for some, Trudeau says more reopening plans expected in 'coming weeks'
articles.description: Canadian citizens and residents who have had a full dose of a coronavirus vaccine can skip a 14-day quarantine in place since March 2020.

articles.author: Tim Richardson
articles.title: Black horse of banking borkage revisits Lloyds
articles.description:
It's working now and they're very sorry
Lloyds Banking Group – which includes Halifax and Bank of Scotland among its stable of financial operators – is back up and running after online and mobile banking services took a tumble earlier today.…

articles.author: Bianca Nogrady
articles.title: Mounting evidence suggests Sputnik COVID vaccine is safe and effective
articles.description: Russia's vaccine is in use in nearly 70 nations, but its adoption has been slowed by controversies and questions over rare side effects, and it has yet to garner World Health Organization approval.
articles.content:
Vials of the Sputnik COVID-19 vaccine pass along a production line at a manufacturing facility near Saint Petersburg, Russia.Credit: Olga Maltseva/AFP/Getty
